jobDescription: The Security Operations Analyst role is tasked with evaluating Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection (WDATP) related events flagged for review by established strategies. This evaluation is performed with various validation tools, understanding and application of computer security topics and malware infections, and identification of new techniques to make quick decisions with a high rate of accuracy. The person in this role will contribute to the strategic development of a new pilot program aimed at further enhancing the world class experience for WDATP customers. The Security Operations Analyst is expected to adhere to numerous Key Performance Indicators to ensure decisions are made balancing factors such as risk tolerance and customer experience.  Another responsibility of this role is to help train machine learning models by labeling transactions, queries, or other entity pairings.Operations Analysts key responsibilities
